name: verify successful login test
description: verify user able to login to OpenKart app with valid credentials
descriptionHtml: verify user able to login to OpenKart app with valid credentials

testStage.description: verify user able to login to OpenKart app with valid credentials

steps.name: open url https://www.opencart.com in web browser

parameters.name: element
parameters.value: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on WINDOWS (75d7640c3ce5a03bac4d41fb0851999c)] -> xpath: //p[text()="Welcome to OpenCart!"]]
